titleStmt.title: Information for the town of Edinburgh, in answer to the representation and answers made against their petition for a small impost for a few years upon their flesh-mercat, for making up a stock for the better maintaining and imploying their poor in manufactories.

Information for the town of Edinburgh, in answer to the representation and answers made against their petition for a small impost for a few years upon their flesh-mercat, for making up a stock for the better maintaining and imploying their poor in manufactories.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
